ygData.subject: Re: What is Kiting?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Per the EQ Glossary: kite - (v.) (usually kiting ) To run around, deliberately training one or more NPCs, killing them slowly with DoT spells, while
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:03 PM 6/2/99 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "Mr. Beeba" <flpmc@...>
>
>One question...what is kiting and how is it done? I have seen this a lot in
>this group, but I am sorry, I have never heard of it before.

Per the EQ Glossary:

kite - (v.) (usually "kiting") To run around, deliberately training one or
more NPCs, killing them slowly with DoT spells, while staying just out of
their reach. e.g. "Dontcha just hate when Bards are kiting, and they drag
Lockjaw down on you?"

The EQ Glossary - learn it, live it, love it ;)

Talies the Wanderer
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqglossary.htm
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm <-The EverQuesting Bard
